headline: 3 Reasons FTV is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Fortive’s 17.8% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 10.5%, and its stock price has climbed to $57.15 per share. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
